mapper.select: SELECT bank_name FROM wb_banks GROUP BY bank_name

SELECT wb.bank_name AS bankName, wb.sub_branch_code AS subBranchCode, bba.accountname AS accountName, bba.bankaccount AS bankAccount FROM budget_bank_account bba LEFT JOIN wb_banks wb ON bba.branchcode = wb.sub_branch_code WHERE bba.bankaccount = #{account}

SELECT wb.bank_name AS bankName, wb.sub_branch_code AS subBranchCode, bba.accountname AS accountName, bba.bankaccount AS bankAccount, bba.code AS bankCode FROM budget_bank_account bba LEFT JOIN wb_banks wb ON bba.branchcode = wb.sub_branch_code WHERE bba.id = #{accountId}

SELECT bbua.bankaccount as bankAccount, wb.bank_name AS bankName, wb.sub_branch_code AS subBranchCode, bbu.id AS billingUnitId, bbu.name AS billingUnitName FROM budget_billing_unit_account bbua LEFT JOIN budget_billing_unit bbu ON bbua.billingunitid = bbu.id LEFT JOIN wb_banks wb ON bbua.branchcode = wb.sub_branch_code WHERE bbua.stopflag = 0 and bbu.stopflag = 0 AND bbua.bankaccount = #{bankAccount}

SELECT bba.branchcode AS subBranchCode, bba.bankaccount AS bankAccount, bbu.name AS billingUnitName, wb.bank_name AS bankName, wb.sub_branch_name AS subBranchName FROM budget_billing_unit_account bba INNER JOIN budget_billing_unit bbu ON bba.billingunitid = bbu.id INNER JOIN wb_banks wb ON wb.sub_branch_code = bba.branchcode WHERE bba.stopflag = 0 and bbu.stopflag = 0 and bbu.id = #{billingUnitId} order by bbu.orderno
